Description.Text: The hotel Le Mondon is located downtown, in the Imperial district, just 5 minute walk from Metz train station (exit Lafayette) and 15 minute walk from the cathedral. Situated facing the fountain of the Place Mondon, hotel is easy to reach either by foot or by car; is also 900 meters away from the Pompidou-Centre-Metz. This is a 38 room hotel. Situated in a quiet district, at five minutes walking distance from the central train station and near the old town, the brand new renovated hotel rooms offer calm and in the same time a proximity from all Metz advertisements and business company. The hotel has negotiated a special rate for guests for 24 hours with Charles de Gaulle car park, opposite the train station, if needed reception will give guests a coupon to benefit from this offer.
